ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Rich in both theory and ethnographic details. Will recommend to those who have some knowledge of scholarship on China and wishes to have a theoretical view on a more abstract level.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The one important thing I learned in class is that, theory alone probably does not count for much. Ethnographic data alone probably does not count for much, either. What does count is to use the theory to explain the material.
